ModMetaData.name: Rim-Robots_ Biotech
ModMetaData.author: VexedTrees
ModMetaData.description: This is a version of Rim-Robots that doesn't require Humanoid Alien Races --- Have you ever wanted to add a lightweight robot/android mod to your modlist, but most of them seemed a little too heavy or otherwise didn't fully fit into the vanilla aesthetic? Then this mod is hopefully for you.\nThe mod adds just enough content for a robot-oriented playthrough, while also being light and balanced enough that it can fit right into the backseat of your regular playthrough and be barely noticed.
